formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Z = 1.2 (Working Capital / Total Assets) + 1.4 (Retained Earnings / Total Assets) + 3.3 (EBIT / Total Assets) + 0.6 (Market Value of Equity / Total Liabilities) + 0.999 (Sales / Total Assets)
